Source.Name: python-notifier
Source.Summary: Python Notifier is a framwork for writing applications based on an event driving architecture
Source.Description: Python Notifier is a framwork for writing applications based on an event driving architecture. It provides one API that internally uses the own or one of three other known event/notifier implementations (GTK+, QT or Twisted). This helps writing libraries or components that may be used witin applications using any of the included notifier implementations.
